markdownRemark.html:
This post is involving the old version site, built with Jekyll. Demo site: https://jekyll.mildronize.com source

Tools for V.2

Main Tools

  • GitHub Page
  • Jekyll
  • Travis
  • Docker

Web Development Tools

  • Bulma - CSS Framework
  • loadCSS - Load CSS files Asynchronously
  • React
  • Webpack4
  • JQuery for using with table of contents
  • lazyload - Lazy load image

Features

  • Search Page with React

  • Blurry Load like Medium. Thanks for [

José's post](https://jmperezperez.com/medium-image-progressive-loading-placeholder/)

Latest version is posted on

ได้ 99 คะแนนจาก Google Insights & เรียนรู้การทำ web optimization

Tools for V.1

Main Tools

  • GitHub Page
  • Jekyll
  • Hyde
  • Docker

Web Development Tools

  • angularJS for search page
  • My Expanding Search Bar, that is original from Expanding Search Bar
  • Font Awesome
  • Table of contents for Jekyll
  • JQuery for using with table of contents

Structure

see README.MD in this repository

Timeline

  • 01 Oct 2014 » Register GitHub Page
  • 02 May 2015 » Clone Hyde theme
  • 03 May 2015 » Create a my first post and fill my profile
  • 03 May 2015 » Add Note page
  • 04 May 2015 » Add social icons using Font Awesome at sidebar
  • 04 May 2015 » Add google analytics at header
  • 04 May 2015 » Add showcase layout
  • 05 May 2015 » Add Search page
  • 05 May 2015 » Add search bar, and binding url and search bar on Search page
  • 06 May 2015 » Add this note
  • 06 May 2015 » Add hover anchor links to header on GitHub Pages using Jekyll
  • 06 May 2015 » Add html header for friendly with search engine such as keywords, description, etc.
  • 07 May 2015 » Add Disqus comment
  • 19 May 2015 » Add featured notes in Note page
  • 19 May 2015 » Add Table of Contents for Jekyll in post layout
  • 24 Jun 2015 » Make this blog to multilanguage :D
  • 28 Oct 2015 » Move to Travis-CI (Build Jekyll site with Travis-CI)
  • 28 jan 2016 » Use Docker instead Jekyll packages on Debian for development and writing a blog.
  • 30 jan 2016 » Combine Thai language into my main blog (This web includes with Thai and English posts).

Next Plans

  • Build a tools for auto generate prototype of post (YAML header)
    • Convert to title string to lowercase of string and dash.
    • Generate simple YAML file.
    • It's called 'Tools' page.
  • Fix Related post to show only the posts that have related tags
  • Auto complete search
  • Cloud tags
